text: læa phwk cea phung ru theid wa nı hmu phwk cea nan mi rx sul khx ngxallxhˌ xyu hak khea (muhammad) cheuxfang phwk cea nı swn hıy khxng kickar læw nænxn phwk cea k ca labak kan tæ xallxhˌ thrng hıkar sraththa pen thirak kæ phwk cea læa di thrng pradab man wi nı dwngcı khxng phwk cea læa thrng hıkar ptiseth sraththa læa khwam chawcha læa kar fafun pen thi na keliyd chang kæ phwk cea chn hela nan khux phwk thi danein xyu nı næwthang thi thuk txng
